articles.description: A Russian Astronaut, Sergey Kud-Sverchkov recently shared an Instagram video from ISS which actually shows an Orange Halo around Earth. Read more to find out.
articles.content: Sergei Kud-Sverchkov, a Russian Astronaut, has shared an interesting video from the space. The video highlights how it may feel like to witness the sunrise as an astronaut. Kud-Sverchkov wrote in the… [+2118 chars]

articles.title: Hubble telescope shares image of barred spiral galaxy NGC 4535 - WION
articles.description: The Hubble Space Telescope has captured the image of NGC 613, a barred spiral galaxy, NASA said in a post.
articles.content:
The Hubble Space Telescope has captured the image of NGC 613, a barred spiral galaxy, NASA said in a post.

articles.author: Olive Marie
articles.title: New Study Shows How Beetles Keep Rivals Off to Feed Their Future Offspring - Science Times
articles.description: Some beetles, like the burying beetles, in particular, are found to have been digging to hide scents of decomposing bounty to keep the rivals away and have something to feed their future offspring.
articles.content:
Scientists recently found that beetles have been hiding their resources to provide food for their future offspring. Specifically, they hunt dead bird and mouse, dig a hole, and bury it.
